summary: The remnants of a massacred cavalry troop and ragtag group of stagecoach passengers fight for survival against fierce Comanches at a desert ruin.
cast: Broderick Crawford|Barbara Hale|Johnny Stewart|Lloyd Bridges|Mickey Shaughnessy|George Mathews|Hugh Sanders|Ric Roman|Chubby Johnson|Martin Milner|Milton Parsons|Jack Woody|John War Eagle|George Chesebro|Steve Forrest|Harry Harvey|Bud Osborne|Rodd Redwing|Jay Silverheels|Charles Soldani|William Wilkerson|Carleton Young
director: Director: André De Toth (as Andre DeToth)
title: Los últimos comanches
